Name: Applicability of local law number 86 for the year 2005.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the applicability of local law number 86 for the year 2005.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1.  Subdivision h of section 224.1 of the New York city charter, as added by local law 86 of 2005, is amended to read as follows:
h.  This section shall not apply to capital projects of entities that are not city agencies that have received capital dollars from the city treasury before January 1, 2007.
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect on January 1, 2007.


LS # 3707
RBU
11/10/2005
